derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin calx, calc- 'lime' (see calx) + -ium

encyclopedia.content: 钙是一种金属元素，符号Ca，银白色晶体。动物的骨骼、蛤壳、蛋壳都含有碳酸钙。可用于合金的脱氧剂、油类的脱水剂、冶金的还原剂、铁和铁合金的脱硫与脱碳剂以及电子管中的吸气剂等。它的化合物在工业上、建筑工程上和医药上用途很大。

entry.def: Calcium is a soft white element which is found in bones and teeth, and also in limestone, chalk, and marble.

means.word_mean: 1. a white metallic element that burns with a brilliant light; the fifth most abundant element in the earth's crust; an important component of most plants and animals

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可计算的, 能预测的
stems_affixes.word_buile: calculate[v.计算,推算;计划,打算]+able能……的→adj.可计算的, 能预测的
re重新+calc石头+itrant表形容词→重新变成石头→顽固的
calc石头+ium表名词,常指化学元素→n.钙[化学符号Ca]
calculate[v.计算,推算;计划,打算]+or物器→n.计算机, 计算器
calc石头+ul+ate表动词→古时用小石计数

sentences.en: We need calcium to make bones.

jushi.english: We need calcium to make bones.
